description_html: BLACKBARN lifestyle brand by Mark and Kristen Zeff teamed up with Spanish furniture brand, ARXE, to bring an exclusive line of pieces to the US market for the first time. ARXE products, which are inspired by nature, are fabricated from both organic and reclaimed materials. Mark Zeff, a designer whose own rustic yet refined aesthetic has set him apart, will make these seating options available at BLACKBARN Chelsea Market shop, cafe & bar this fall.
